personalInfo.name: Rijul Singla
personalInfo.tagline: Crafting immersive worlds and engaging gameplay experiences.

aboutMe: Hello! I'm Rijul Singla, a passionate and driven game developer dedicated to crafting engaging interactive experiences. I specialize in Unity Engine development, C++, C#, game design, and level design.

My journey into game development began with modding classic games, a path that quickly evolved into a deep dive into engine programming and core game design principles. I thrive on bringing innovative ideas to life, solving complex technical challenges, and collaborating with creative minds.

When I'm not immersed in development, you can find me exploring new game worlds, streaming on YouTube/Twitch, or discovering new music. I am continuously eager to learn and grow, always pushing the boundaries of what's possible in game development.

projects.title: Pringles: A Potato Revolution
contributions: Designed and developed all aspects of this top-down endless runner, my first solo project, centered on a potato's escape and a revolution.
Crafted the game's unique and engaging original lore and backstory.
Implemented core gameplay mechanics for movement, obstacles, and progression across Windows and Linux platforms.

projects.title: Time Strider (Game Jam)
contributions: Led programming and game design for the core tower defense mechanics, including wave management and time-based challenges.
Implemented enemy AI (clock-themed) and crystal-powered defense systems within a tight game jam deadline.
Collaborated with 'chasingxstars' on this project for Micro Jam 034: Defense.

projects.title: Pigeon Patrol (Game Jam)
contributions: Led programming and game design for the unique pigeon-shooing and balloon-popping action mechanics.
Implemented 360-degree camera rotation, zoom functionality, and responsive WASD/mouse controls.
Contributed to the overall action-game design in a collaborative game jam setting.

projects.title: Shaolin Slice (Game Jam)
contributions: Programmed and designed the core rhythm-based slicing mechanics, synchronized with musical beats.
Ensured historical accuracy in monk movements, stances, and slicing animations.
Developed diverse slicing challenges, from bamboo cutting to battlefield combat scenarios, reflecting medieval China.

contact.introText: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to connect with me!
